resources.string: Hello, and welcome to Miami Dade College North Campus! Feel free to press an option or speak it to see more information.
These are some of the general questions that a student may want to know before coming to Miami Dade College, select a topic to learn more!

"These are the Bachelor Programs that the School of Engineering and Technology offers." + "From Artificial Intelligence, Networking, to Electrical Engineering, and many others, Miami Dade College offers a variety of STEM programs for students interesting in developing skills for a career in technology." + "Select a program for more information."

At Miami Dade College, advisors are here to help you navigate your academic journey. They provide assistance with course planning, career guidance, transfer options, and personal development. You can visit the Advisement and Career Services department in person or online for personalized support.

Miami Dade College offers flexible learning options to fit your needs. " + "You can choose in-person classes, blended formats combining online and traditional instruction, " + "MDC Live for real-time virtual learning, or fully online courses for flexibility. " + "Explore these options to find the learning style that works best for you.

Miami Dade College offers a variety of scholarships " + "to support students in technology programs. These include the Javier Coto Scholarship, City of Miami Residents Scholarship, " + "and the FPL Tech Scholarship. Explore these options to help fund your academic journey in engineering and technology. " + "For more details, contact the EnTec department or visit the scholarships webpage.

Miami Dade College is dedicated to making higher education affordable and accessible for everyone. " + "Through a variety of financial aid options, including grants, scholarships, loans, and work-study programs, " + "students can pursue their education without financial barriers. " + "MDC is committed to supporting your journey with resources and guidance to help you achieve your academic goals. " + "Read the screen to learn more about the financial aid opportunities available at Miami Dade College.

"Miami Dade College offers a Bachelor of Science in Applied Artificial Intelligence. " + "This program provides practical skills in machine learning, natural language processing, " + "and computer vision. It emphasizes ethical and socially responsible practices. " + "Graduates are prepared for roles such as AI Analysts and Machine Learning Specialists. " + "For more information, please visit double u double u double u dot m d c dot e d u slash applied a i b s.

The Bachelor of Science in Information Systems Technology with a Software Engineering Concentration at Miami Dade College provides students with critical skills in software design, programming, data structures, and systems analysis. The curriculum covers software engineering principles, computer architecture, data structures, and algorithms.

Miami Dade College offers a Bachelor of Science in Data Analytics. The program provides students with the skills to interpret and present large datasets essential for organizational success. Hands-on training emphasizes data manipulation and analysis across various industries.

Miami Dade College offers a Bachelor of Science in Cybersecurity. The program provides hands-on training in ethical hacking, information security management, network defense, penetration testing, and computer forensics. Recognized by the National Security Agency as a Center of Academic Excellence in Cyber Defense, graduates are prepared for roles such as Security System Administrators and Information Security Analysts.

The Bachelor of Science in Information Systems Technology with a Networking Concentration at Miami Dade College provides students with critical skills in network design, planning, implementation, and management. The curriculum covers network security, information storage management, systems administration, wireless networks, and IT project management.

Miami Dade College offers a Bachelor of Science in Electrical and Computer Engineering Technology (BS-ECET), providing practical, hands-on experience in engineering-related project management, teamwork, and technical writing. The program facilitates seamless credit transfer for students with an Associate in Science in Electronics Engineering Technology or Computer Engineering Technology.
